title: Old Harrowing Skins
body: Hi, just a quick question here: can I buy underworld tf or wukong alone or do i have to get the bundle? Ty for answering.

replies.body:
They are available separately from the bundle! Check out the screenshot below ^.^

(Click to Enlarge)
http://imgur.com/a/eLEbN

Let me know if you have any other questions.
u can buy those skins separate from the bundle
